rdf:Description.dc:title: Bow River recreation study : an assessment of recreational use and economic benefits 1988 an assessment of recreational use and economic benefits.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Forestry, Lands and Wildlife.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton, Alta.] : Alberta Forestry, Lands and Wildlife,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Prepared for Resource Evaluation and Planning Branch, Alberta Forestry, Lands and Wildlife. Steering Committee for the study consisted of representatives from Alberta Environment, Alberta Tourism, Alberta Recreation and Parks, Alberta Forestry, Lands and Wildlife, and Trout Unlimited
Vol. 1. Summary. -- v. 2. River surveys. -- v. 3. Guided angler survey. -- v. 4. Household survey.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Recreational surveys
Outdoor recreation
Water quality
Fishing
Rivers
